CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 46 POBDTPD and PEBDTPD films also showed similar absorption bandwidth and shape.

Let's think step by step.

1. POBDTPD: This is a material name. It stands for Poly(3-octylthiophene-2,5-diyl-alt-3-[N,N-bis(4-methoxyphenyl)amino]stilbene-2,5-diyl).
2. PEBDTPD: This is also a material name. It stands for Poly(3-hexylthiophene-2,5-diyl-alt-3-[N,N-bis(4-ethylphenyl)amino]stilbene-2,5-diyl).

So, the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph are POBDTPD and PEBDTPD.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. POBDTPD
2. PEBDTPD

These are the entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to Material Names.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
